rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with space for a coat closet and a reception area. The foyer is designed according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living room with colonial design elements including high ceilings and large windows for ample natural light. The orientation adheres to Vastu by aligning the main entrance to the east.
Dining area adjacent to the living room; designed for social gatherings and family meals. Vastu guidelines ensure it is positioned towards the south-east.
Modern colonial style kitchen equipped with ample storage space. The north-west position is considered auspicious according to Vastu principles.
Small guest bathroom adjacent to the living room for convenience; designed with proper ventilation in mind.
A dedicated private gym space located within the ground floor. The design incorporates natural light and ventilation as per Vastu norms for energy flow.
Serves as a storage area for cleaning supplies and other utilities; located near the kitchen.

openings.description: Large colonial-style door with sidelights for a traditional look. Vastu recommends the east facing entrance.
Large window ensuring ample natural light in accordance with colonial design aesthetics and Vastu principles for illumination.
Strategically placed window to provide a view and natural light while maintaining privacy.
A small balcony offering outdoor access with adherence to Vastu recommendations for fresh air circulation.
